name: ComparatorChain_addComparatorTest
description: Unit tests for the addComparator method in the ComparatorChain class.

test_cases.name: testAddComparator_ForwardOrder
test_cases.description: Tests adding a comparator in forward order to the ComparatorChain.

test_cases.name: testAddComparator_ReverseOrder
test_cases.description: Tests adding a comparator in reverse order to the ComparatorChain.

test_cases.name: testAddComparator_LockedChain
test_cases.description: Tests adding a comparator to a locked ComparatorChain, which should throw an UnsupportedOperationException.
